name: VC360 Experiments
tagline: A Virtual Reality system log for Virtual Reality life long project by Tomoyoshi Yamamoto. The logs are updated daily. Please contact me if you're interested. If you want to join the experiment, or become a BETA tester, please contact me with your GitHub email account.
body:
###Welcome to the Media Lab for VC360 Project.
***
###Access to our Experiment Log.
[Click Here](http://www.tomowareexperiments.blogspot.jp/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
